short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Increase your vocabulary with this simple extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Upword is a Chrome Extension for Gmail that allows user to quickly replace words with their synonyms. Upword can also be configured using a hotkey (in development).
